basicInfo.name: Hellenia
basicInfo.flavor: Hellenia joined the Evan Expedition to thank them for saving her sister. Her skills in battle are a truly celestial sight to behold.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - Single Enemy
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack plus 70% of Defense.

Skill 1.name: Celestial Light
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 55% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - All Allies
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Debuff Removal count becomes 2.
超越2段階達成効果
 - All Enemies
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 40% Increased Miss Chance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Celestial Shield
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Magic Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Magic Damage Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Turns: Magic Damage Immunity duration becomes 3 turn(s).

Passive.name: Valkyrie's Presence
Passive.desc:
Ally with the Lowest Current HP
 - Getting attacked by an enemy 5 time(s) heals HP equal to 30% of the caster's Defense.
 - Self
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 35% of Defense.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Number of Targets: To 2 Allies with the lowest current HP

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Heavenia, cookies, black tea, justice, order, kindness, curiosity, innocence, cleaning, laundry, reading
profile.dislikes: Dellons, Sun Wukong, other animal milk, evil, chaos, things being dirty, things being messy
profile.story: Hellenia received the Celestial Shield from the gods as a reward for winning a war. She is a trusted Valkyrie among her allies due to her kindness and superb fighting skills.

basicInfo.name: Hellenia
basicInfo.flavor: Hellenia's grueling search for her sister in Asgar forged her strength. Now that she has found her sister, she eagerly awaits the day they can return home.

 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack plus 50% of Defense 1 time(s).

 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack.
